import Paper from "../Generic/Paper" import Skeleton from "../Generic/Skeleton" import Typography from "../Generic/Typography" import Card from "./Card" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import Button from "../Generic/Button" const List = (props) => { const { movies } = props const [cardAmt, setCardAmt] = useState(0) return (
test summary {movies.map((movie) => ( ` ${genre.name}`)]} rating={6} popularity='43' >
Summary
{movie.details.overview.length > 400 ? `${movie.details.overview.substring(0, 400)}-` : movie.details.overview}
) )}
) } export default List
